attributes.action: Not 1p of tax payers money spent on Thatchers Funeral
attributes.additional_details: Not even 1p of Goverment / Public money should be spent on Margaret Thatchers Funeral. Let the Tory party and their supporters fund it by what they save in either offshore tax havens or their savings on the top rate tax cuts. Given this current Governments economic policy of cuts, mass redundancies & pay freezes in the forces ,local goverment. police forces, health industries and education etc, This funeral should mirror her own legacy of privatisattion in memory of all those once working communities across England, Scotland & Wales she helped to turn into communities with generations blighted by mass unemployment, poor housing, crime, drink / drug problems and child poverty.
